thread.title: ClearOne Awarded Two New Patents by the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office
thread.title_full: ClearOne Awarded Two New Patents by the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office

author: PRNW
title: ClearOne Awarded Two New Patents by the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office
text:
SALT LAKE CITY , Sept. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- ClearOne (NASDAQ: CLRO), a global provider of audio and visual communication solutions, announced today that it has been awarded a new patent related to audio streaming over IP networks.
On September 15, 2015 , the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office ("USPTO") issued United States Patent number 9,137,035 entitled Legacy Converter and Controller for an Audio Video Distribution System. The '035 patent relates to converting analog or digital audio into a streaming data format for distribution on an IP network and also covers control of the source device using a web browser.
To date, ClearOne has been awarded 64 patents and has an additional 36 patents in application covering innovations in the areas of audio and video processing, audio and video streaming, and communication technologies.
About ClearOne
ClearOne is a global company that designs, develops and sells conferencing, collaboration, streaming and digital signage solutions for voice and visual communications. The performance and simplicity of its advanced, comprehensive solutions offer unprecedented levels of functionality, reliability, and scalability.
Printable releases are available in our Investor Relations area at http://investors.clearone.com .
Contact:

801-975-7200

SOURCE ClearOne
